name: Brogan Bentley - Realm of The Keeper

metadata.name: Realm of The Keeper 1
metadata.description:
Celestial light strikes pools of mercury-filled labradorite crystal, casting ancient spells of forgotten memory through the aether, all but dissolved lest in deep states of meditation and hallucination. 

A realm unseen given form in the mind's eye and known in the heart, the subsonic bellows of darkened cavern are illuminated by flashes of a primordial glow. 

A mirror, as above, so below, of hybrid realities and timelines.
--

1/1 
3840 × 2160 .mp4
"Realm of The Keeper 1" is a collaboration between Bay Area composer Brogan Bentley and motion graphics artist Erik Wilson.

Revenue split from initial sale:
33% Brogan Bentley
33% Erik Wilson
33% Leaving Records

*Winner of primary auction receives 70 $GENRE, full-resolution video, and a vinyl LP of Brogan Bentley's Diapason Rex full-length album.
